com.db.chart.animation

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.db.chart.animation.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the whole animation process.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareEnterAnimation

        public java.util.ArrayList<ChartSet> prepareEnterAnimation(ChartView chartView)
        Method that prepares the enter animation. Defines starting points, targets, distance, yadda, as well as the first set of points to be drawn.
        Parameters:
        chartView - ChartView
        Returns:
        Initial chart data state before starting animation

      • prepareUpdateAnimation

        public java.util.ArrayList<ChartSet> prepareUpdateAnimation(java.util.ArrayList<float[][]> start,
                                                            java.util.ArrayList<float[][]> end)
        Method that prepares the enter animation. Defines starting points, targets, distance, yadda, as well as the first set of points to be drawn.

        values and to get the ChartSet containing the target values

        Parameters:
        start - Animation start display coordinates
        end - Animation end display coordinates
        Returns:
        Initial chart data state before starting animation

      • prepareExitAnimation

        public java.util.ArrayList<ChartSet> prepareExitAnimation(ChartView chartView)
        Method that prepares the enter animation. Defines starting points, targets, distance, yadda, as well as the first set of points to be drawn.
        Parameters:
        chartView - ChartView to be invalidate each time the animation wants to update values and to get the ChartSet containing the target values
        Returns:
        Initial chart data state before starting animation

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Information on animation is still on going on not.
        Returns:
        True if animation is running, False otherwise.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel every running animator.

      • getEndAction

        public java.lang.Runnable getEndAction()
        Get current action to be executed once animation finishes.
        Returns:
        Current action to be executed once animation finishes

      • setInterpolator

        public Animation setInterpolator(TimeInterpolator interpolator)
        Animation easing will be managed differently depending on which TimeInterpolator object is defined.
        Parameters:
        interpolator - TimeInterpolator object responsible to interpolate animation values
        Returns:
        Animation self-reference.

      • setDuration

        public Animation setDuration(int duration)
        Set animation duration.
        Parameters:
        duration - Animation duration
        Returns:
        Animation self-reference.

      • inSequence

        public Animation inSequence(float factor,
                            int[] order)
        Entries will animate sequentially instead of all at the same time, but also in a specific order.
        Parameters:
        order - Sequentiality order
        factor - In case animation should show an overlap between entries
        Returns:
        Animation self-reference.

      • inSequence

        public Animation inSequence(float factor)
        Entries will animate sequentially instead of all at the same time.
        Parameters:
        factor - In case animation should show an overlap between entries
        Returns:
        Animation self-reference.

      • withEndAction

        public Animation withEndAction(java.lang.Runnable endAction)
        Sets an action to be executed once the animation finishes.
        Parameters:
        endAction - to be executed once the animation finishes
        Returns:
        Animation self-reference.

      • fromXY

        public Animation fromXY(float xFactor,
                        float yFactor)
        Sets the starting point for the animation. Eg. xFactor=0; yFactor=0; starts the animation on the bottom left corner of the inner chart area.
        Parameters:
        xFactor - horizontal factor between 0 and 1. If not applied then -1 can be set.
        yFactor - vertical factor between 0 and 1. If not applied then -1 can be set.
        Returns:
        Animation self-reference.

      • fromAlpha

        public Animation fromAlpha(int alpha)
        Sets an alpha value to animate from. To disable set it to -1.
        Parameters:
        alpha - alpha value from where chart will animate from.
        Returns:
        Animation self-reference.

      • setAnimationListener

        public Animation setAnimationListener(ChartAnimationListener callback)
        Callback to use in every chart data update.
        Parameters:
        callback - Callback to be called in every data update
        Returns:
        Animation self-reference.

      • fromColor

        public Animation fromColor(int color)
        Animate from a specific color until the already set entry's color.
        Parameters:
        color - Color to animate from
        Returns:
        Animation self-reference.
